key_backup_text_1: Seed ključa se koristi za generiranje svih adresa. Svaka osoba s pristupom seedu ključa ima djelomičnu kontrolu nad novčanikom.
key_backup_text_2: Držite sigurnosnu kopiju svog seed ključa na sigurnom mjestu.
key_backup_text_3: Gubitak seed ključa rezultirat će gubitkom pristupa vašem novčaniku.
seed_phrase_backed_up: Spremio/la sam svoju frazu seed ključa na sigurnom mjestu.
key_seed_info: SSP Key i SSP Wallet moraju koristiti jedinstvene, različite seed fraze.
err_enter_seed: Molimo unesite svoju frazu seed ključa
err_invalid_seed: Fraza seed ključa je nevažeća. Fraza seed ključa mora sadržavati barem 12 riječi.
err_seed_invalid_words: Fraza seed ključa sadrži nevažeće riječi: {{words}}.
err_seed_invalid_spaces: Fraza seed ključa sadrži dodatne razmake.
backup_needed: Morate napraviti sigurnosnu kopiju svoje fraze seed ključa prije nego što možete sinkronizirati ključ.
err_setting_key: Došlo je do pogreške prilikom postavljanja vašeg ključa.
input_mnemonic: Unesite svoju Mnemonic Seed Frazu Ključa
ssp_key_mnemonic_sec: WARNING: For security reasons, the seed phrase is displayed in 3 parts. Please join them together to get the full seed phrase. It is highly discouraged to copy the seed phrase into your clipboard, any application or website has access to clipboard and can see your seed phrase. Remember to delete the seed phrase from your clipboard after copying!
strong_password: Strong password should contain at least 8 characters, 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 number, and 1 special character.
weak_password_info: Your password is weak which affects the security of your key.
weak_password_confirm: Would you like to change it?
weak_password_confirm_cancel: Yes, I want to change it.
rooted_device: Your device appears to be rooted! This significantly compromises the security of the SSP Key!
jailbroken_device: Your device appears to be jailbroken! This significantly compromises the security of the SSP Key!
